LightningComponentBundle.description: Simple Conditional Display Container with up to 15 zones based on multiple field values

property.name: forceDisplay
property.label: Force Complete Display?
property.description: Flag to force the display of all sections (for Builder configuration).

property.name: sourceField
property.label: Source Field
property.description: Field to use to evaluate display condition.

property.name: isMvField
property.label: Multi-Value Source Field?
property.description: Flag to indicate that the sourceField is a multi-value.

property.name: list1
property.label: Condition #1
property.description: List of values (single value source field) or value (multi-value source field) for section #1
